A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I had probably too high expectations after Rogue One. 

Appart from massive plot hole or deus ex machina every 10 minutes or so\, I am really missing a strong protagonist. Someone who appears to know what she is doing and does not rely exclusively on longshots and miracles. 

Only Benicio Del Toro's character satisfied these conditions in this movie. Everyone else sucks at their jobs. Badly.
